page.title: 04Housing Survey
page.content: This survey was taken by the school population and may give an indication of housing in the village. 1.Kind of House:Farm=17 Cottage=17 Detached=14 Semi-detached=2 Terraced=2 2.Age of House:0-20years=2 20-50years=8 Older=43 3.How Many Storeys:1=22 2=27 3=6 4.How Many Bedrooms:1=0 2=9 3=22 4=5 More=12 5.Do You Have A Garden? Front=37 Rear=37 6.Amenities:W.C.=58 Bath/Showerroom50 Garage=30 T.V.=53 Video=10 Music Centre=36 Washing Machine=50 Dishwasher=11 Tumble Dryer=15 Freezer=45 Computer=7 7.Central Heating:Coal=9 Gas=1 Oil=6 Electric=6 8.House Ownership:Self=25 Council=2 Employer=19 Another=5 {Survey Taken On 52 Houses.}
